channel.title: Invisible aryan
channel.description: How can I make Aryan loading invisible (Only the command screen). I need this for my project Aryan on School :p.

item.title: Invisible aryan
item.dc:creator: @Nerice Nerice
item.description:
@Nerice wrote:

auto login and never show the frame...

if you want to make it disappear after logging in, set the frame to hide on exit, rather than close on exit.

Read full topic

item.title: Invisible aryan
item.dc:creator: @qauters qauters
item.description:
@qauters wrote:

xerozcheez:

Making something that auto logs you in, then make a bat file that loads aryan, and it'll be invisible but it'll be running, i know because i use the bat thing to reboot my server every hour (not using that taskkill thing btw, its my own code).

The auto-login is easy just change the config file but i am quit new to programming so i don't know how to set the bat file like that.

Read full topic
